attributes.action: Cap the energy company profits ie Gas ,Water Electricity and to stop subsidising other country's at the British people's expense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the privatisation of the British Utility's .Britain has seen these valuable services which everybody relise on been taken over by our foreign counter parts,as a result the year on year increases on these services to the house holder have escalated to almost to a point where the British peoples are now finding it hard to survive,and are subsidising the country's which own them ie France, Germany, and Spain when there governments have a capping in place, which is completely unfair and unjust.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
